message.raw:
Remove --delay from restarting. It is no longer needed as the server is now
cleanly shut down and does not rely on the process ending for the port
to be freed. Removing the --delay makes the restart arguments identical to
the arguments that initially started the program, which makes Windows recognize
BLACS as BLACS, rather than displaying the wrong icon in the taskbar.

message:
Remove --delay from restarting. It is no longer needed as the server is now
cleanly shut down and does not rely on the process ending for the port
to be freed. Removing the --delay makes the restart arguments identical to
the arguments that initially started the program, which makes Windows recognize
BLACS as BLACS, rather than displaying the wrong icon in the taskbar.
